bug.author: jroes
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Type here a clear and concise description of the bug. Aim for 2-3 sentences. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug:
xcode-select --install /usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" brew install yarn protobuf graphviz gawk mysql mysql-client unixodbc pipenv pip3 install streamlit
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
I expected the install to complete successfully. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Fails to complete install. <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: N/A Python version: Python 3.8.2, pip 19.2.3 Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? Using stock Python3 install on OSX. OS version: OS X Big Sur 11.0.1 Browser version: Chrome (but N/A) CPU Architecture: Apple Silicon / M1
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
This is a new laptop using Apple's new M1 chip, it's possible there are some weird CPU architecture things happening. Console output with and without Rosetta2: <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/jroes/06e33e0815baa38ce6b52eea17dbf9f1>https://gist.github.com/jroes/06e33e0815baa38ce6b52eea17dbf9f1</denchmark-link>
